sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cmdb_model_category</collection> <condition>sn_ent.EnterpriseContentEAMUtils.isEnterpriseModelClass(current.product_model_class) && sn_ent.EnterpriseContentEAMUtils.isEnterpriseClassAsset(current.asset_class)</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Avoid update if Enterprise Asset exits</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var gr = new GlideRecord(sn_ent.EnterpriseContentEAMUtils.BASE_CLASSES.ASSET_BASE_CLASS); query = "model_category.sys_id=" + current.sys_id; gr.addEncodedQuery(query); gr.query();
// if aleast one eam asset is assigned to this category then do not allow edit of model category if (gr.getRowCount() >= 1) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Assets are assigned to the model category therefore it cannot be edited.")); global.ModelUtils.setAbortAction(current, true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-23 00:30:38</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>17c29193b7928110574d16bf7e11a944</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Avoid update if Enterprise Asset exits</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">7e67d4ff091b4110f87739da6a8d8c7d</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">7e67d4ff091b4110f87739da6a8d8c7d</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_17c29193b7928110574d16bf7e11a944</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-23 23:05:38</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=17c29193b7928110574d16bf7e11a944"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Avoid update if Enterprise Asset exits
